body.name: Brondell Air Purifier O2+ Revive Air Purification System | Allergy Relief and Odor Eliminator | for Dust, Mold, Smoke, Off-Gassing and Pets | Dual True HEPA Filter | Evaporative Humidification | Black
features: REVIVE YOUR HOME: Don’t just filter your air, refresh it with the Brondell Revive air purifier and humidifier. Adding moisture to filtered air can help relieve allergy symptoms, stuffy nose and sinus congestion. Helpful to relieve dry skin and reduce asthma symptoms by clearing mucous from airways. Super-efficient evaporative humidification makes for a more consistent humidity level and won’t over-saturate the immediately-surrounding area.

TWICE THE AIR, HALF THE TIME: With a dual suction system the Revive is able to move through more air faster than comparable sized machines. Moving air through dual True HEPA filters, that remove 99.97% of particulates and allergens larger than 0.3 microns, makes your air cleaner and fresher so you can breathe easier. Dual intake also creates better airflow, the Revive will refresh the air in a 627sf room 3 times every hour.

ACTIVE CARBON AND SPECIALIZED FILTERS: The Granulated Carbon Filter traps and removes odors, harmful gases, and VOCs. The Off-Gassing Reduction Filter effectively removes invisible substances like formaldehyde and VOCs that contribute to “Sick House Syndrome” and can cause health and respiratory issues. Other Specialized Filters are available for purchase separately.

EVAPORATIVE HUMIDIFICATION: With the Evaporative Humidification Method, the water particles used to humidify the room’s atmosphere are small and light-weight. The smaller particle size can travel through the air more easily and efficiently, providing an even humidity throughout the room. Evaporative Humidification is self-regulating, as the room’s atmosphere determines how much water evaporates from the humidifier into the air.

We design products that help protect our planet’s essential resources. From water-saving showers and lower-waste water filtration to bidets that help reduce toilet paper and energy use, we’re helping you live more sustainably and it feels better already.
body.description: O2+ Revive The Revive is a combination air purifier and humidifier, designed to remove pollutants and add moisture for cleaner, more comfortable air. The self-regulating Evaporative Humidification Method utilizes small, light-weight water particles to evenly humidify the room. The water tank holds 3.5 Liters of water for a full day of humidification. Auto-Adjusting Humidifier Both a Humidifier Filter and a Humidity Sensor work together to control the amount of moisture released based on the room's temperature and humidity level. Four Operating Modes In Auto Mode and Eco Mode, the air flow speed is automatically controlled based on the air quality in the room. In Allergen Mode, the fan speed automatically goes to maximum, quickly removing pollutants in the room. In Fan Speed Mode, or Manual Mode, the fan speed is set to your liking, regardless of the air quality in the room. Air Quality Indicator The Air Quality Indicator is a light that changes color in real time to indicate the air quality of the room, as measured by the Air Quality Sensor.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #761,507 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen) #705 in HEPA Filter Air Purifiers

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HEPA (high-efficiency particulate arrestance) removes 99.97% of particles including dust, smoke, and pet dander that have a size of 0.3 µm (micron) or larger (from the air that passes through the filter). A dual suction system allows the Revive to cycle through air quickly and effectively, making your air cleaner and fresher. The Granulated Carbon Filter traps and removes odors and harmful gases. The Off-Gassing Reduction Filter effectively removes substances like formaldehyde. Other Specialized Filters are available for purchase separately. The water particles used to humidify the room’s atmosphere are small and lightweight providing an even humidity throughout the room for maximum comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars quiet and effective
reviews.reviewText: We bought this last year and are still happy with it. It's cut down considerably on how much dusting we have to do, even in spring pollen season, as well as stuffy-winter-house smells. While it's a little bigger than we imagined, it's light enough to move to different rooms when we have visitors.We loaned it to our sister-in-law when her son (vaxxed and tested, but ...) visited, and she liked it so much she bought one for herself. And we just got a second one for ourselves to cover more of the house.And it's quiet. Mostly it runs at medium speed, but even at high speed, it's still not loud - you're just a bit more aware of it.In the dead of winter, when the air is super dry inside and out, the humidifier isn't quite enough on its own, but perhaps the second unit will help with that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is my 3rd one, it takes a little bit of maintenance because of all the parts but it is totally worth it. I can feel the difference in the air quality when it’s not on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Poor design for customer ease of handling
reviews.reviewText: I recently bought the Brondell Air Purifier O2+ Revive Air Purification System Humidifier from Amazon and although it seems to work fine, I am considering returning it since there are no casters so it's very heavy/impossible to move around (the manual says there is a handle near the bottom - not a good place for a handle) so I put it on sliders. Also, the water tank is very poorly designed as well - when filling, the rounded top slides in the sink and I have to wrestle with it each time I fill it so it won't fall and crack or empty the water - very hard to hold. The entire unit seems to not be ergonomically designed for customer comfort and ease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effective and high quality air purifier
reviews.reviewText: This air purifier reduced my allergies. It operates very well. A buyer should be aware that the filters are expensive, and you have to replace then annually, but that is the unavoidable cost of getting purified air.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Never noticed difference in air quality and cannot get the expensive replacement filters
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this unit in December 2021 and used it for several months with no issues. However I never really noticed any difference in my air quality. Now that it is cold and dry weather I would like to be able to use the humidifier but I cannot find the replacement filters. Amazon used to have them but they are currently unavailable and when they do have them they’re extremely expensive. So I have a $500 system that is worthless to me!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars GREAT air cleaner. Decent humidifier

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars handles large room
reviews.reviewText: The room we placed this in is 16 x16 and the unit handles it well. The air is perfect now.

reviews.reviewTitle: not worth the money - a box with a fan
reviews.reviewText: not worth the money - a box with a fan

Unit was smaller than expected and is only good for a small space of no more than 350 square feet. And for all the hype at the end of the day, it's a fan with an attached water jug and a myriad of expensive replacement filters that keep showing up in my feed. I expected more for $600.
